desc.help:
Get help on a command or specific command.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds.
desc.role:
Get any role that starts with [r]
Users with `manage_roles` permission can add and remove any role below their top.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds.
desc.config:
Get all values or set spesific ones. Giving you more control over my actions.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.slowmode:
Set the slowmode of the channel or thread.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.kick:
Kicks a given member.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.ban:
Bans a given member and can delete a certon days worth of messages.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.clear:
Purges a set of messages in a channel or thread.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.timeout:
Timesout a given user from anywhere from seconds to 4 weeks.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.echo:
Make me say something.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.react:
Make me react to a message.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.clone:
Make a user say anything you want.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.fact:
Very cool facts! (wowzas!)

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.rate:
I'll rate something, all my opinions are fact.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.ask:
Got a question? AidanBot will answer it, it'll probably be wrong tho.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.percent:
What percentage of something is you?

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.decide:
I'll pick a random result of given options.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.poll:
Create a poll.

Cooldown: 1 per 12 seconds.
desc.fight:
Fight someone or set 2 others up to fight to the death!!

Cooldown: 1 per 30 seconds.
desc.rps:
Classic game of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

Cooldown: 1 per 10 seconds.
desc.emu:
Adds emulogic text to an image.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.killoverlay:
Adds a deathscreen overlay to an image. Currently have minecraft, darksouls, gta and ass.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.quoted:
Create a fake quote of yourself.

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.quotel:
Create a fake quote of yourself. Now in light mode!

Cooldown: 1 per 5 seconds.
desc.join: Joins the authors currnet VC if not in use.
desc.now: Show what song is currently playing.
desc.resume: Resumes the current song is paused.
desc.queue: Shows all songs in the queue.
desc.remove: Removes a song from the queue.
desc.loop: Loops the current song, run again to unpause.
desc.play: Play a song or add a song to queue if in use.
desc.reload: Reloads an extension or loads extension if undloaded.
